rows.label: tlk41100221_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I know it's dangerous, but if I spot
a rare bug, I just have to chase it,
even if it means going out of town.

rows.label: tlk41100221_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I just can't help myself. Whenever
I see a bug, I run right after them!

rows.label: tlk41100221_03_msg0004
rows.name:
It's instinct or something. I just wanna
scramble through the bushes to get
to them. You know what I mean?

rows.label: tlk41100221_01_msg0005
rows.name:
But, I mean, I don't want to put you
guys through all that bother again.
I'll be more careful in future.
